section.p: You can include comments in the query string. To insert a one-line comment, begin the line with two dashes --. To insert a multiple-line comment, or to embed a comment within a line, begin it with /* and end it with */.

The following query strings include comments: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM /portfolios /* here is a comment */ WHERE status = 'active'SELECT DISTINCT * FROM /portfolios WHERE status = 'active' -- here is another comment
